titleStmt.title: A true and exact relation of the taking of Newhassell by storm. Together with the defeat of the Serasquier Bassa before Grann, by the Duke of Lorrain, as it was brought from Vienna by the Sieur Martell to the governour of the Spanish Netherlands.

publicationStmt.publisher: Re-printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, printer to his most sacred Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
